translations: v.用指关节敲击（knuckle 的 ing 形式）

phrs.translation: [口语](笑话等)近乎猥亵的，近乎下流的，近乎粗鄙的

sentences.sentence: Knuckling over of the front legs is a disqualification.
sentences.translation: 前腿有突球是不合格的。

sentences.sentence: Knuckling at fetlocks, ataxia, tail deviation and tail may be flaccid.
sentences.translation: 扣打距毛，运动失调，尾偏斜和尾可能松垂。

sentences.sentence: Businesses will object to strict regulations without the prospect of their international competitors in America, China and India knuckling under.
sentences.translation: 各公司看不到美国，中国和印度的竞争对手服从政策的迹象，也将会对严格制度加以抵抗。
